definition: to waste/to spend/to consume/to squander/news/(coll.) to delay/to dilly-dally

sentences.english: The young author burned energy as if he never heard of resting.
sentences.chinese: 這位青年作家耗費精力，似乎從未聽說過休息。

sentences.english: No. 5 Take time-consuming homework in stages.
sentences.chinese: 要把耗費時間的作業分爲幾個階段來做。

sentences.english: Every hiccough of our sewers costs us a thousand francs.
sentences.chinese: 陰溝每打一個噎，就耗費一千法郎。

sentences.english: Too much heavy labour was involved in getting material in and out of the silo .
sentences.chinese: 將青貯飼料從貯倉中搬出或搬進需要耗費大量的勞動。

sentences.english: It can be shown that this recursive solution takes exponential time to run.
sentences.chinese: 可以證明，這種遞歸解法需要耗費指數級的時間。

sentences.english: The projects, commonly known as earmarks, cost billions of dollars.
sentences.chinese: 這些俗稱專項撥款的項目會耗費數十億美元。

sentences.english: Your work is too much a brain-drain?
sentences.chinese: 工作操煩耗費大量腦力嗎？

sentences.english: Not one penny should be spent for a circlet of gold to testify that we are married.
sentences.chinese: 我們不應耗費分文去買金環來證明我們已婚的身份。

sentences.english: Lobby groups could water down plans that will cost industry money.
sentences.chinese: 遊說團體可以沖淡這個耗費企業資金的計劃。

sentences.english: Effluence and affluence have a way of going together.
sentences.chinese: 耗費和富裕往往是聯繫在一起的。

sentences.english: No doubt about it, disciplining our kids takes time and energy.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，管教孩子需要耗費時間和精力。

sentences.english: I don't want to be trapped in my tiny little world, wasting the precious times.
sentences.chinese: 再不願陷在這狹小的天地，耗費如此寶貴的韶華。

sentences.english: It takes a lot of resource to generate a sizable amount of data to represent an audio file.
sentences.chinese: 生成大量數據以代表一個音頻文件需要耗費許多資源。

sentences.english: I always take fuel consumption into consideration when buying a car.
sentences.chinese: 我買汽車時總要把燃油消耗費考慮在內。

sentences.english: The frequency with which teams will want to use an assessment is inversely proportional to the time it takes.
sentences.chinese: 團隊想要進行評估的頻率反比於評估所耗費的時間。

sentences.english: Similarly, if the work package is too small, it would consume a lot of effort in managing.
sentences.chinese: 類似地，工作包過小意味着管理所需的耗費更大。

definition: many and complicated/mired in minor details
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
to utilize/to put sth to use
valuable/precious/to value/to treasure/to set store by
time-consuming/to take a period of (x amount of time)
to sacrifice one's life/to sacrifice (sth valued)/beast slaughtered as a sacrifice
